mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_SCHEMA FROM information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA not in ('information_schema', 'mysql', 'sys', 'performance_schema')

SELECT CREATE_TIME create_at, UPDATE_TIME update_at, TABLE_ROWS data_rows, TABLE_SCHEMA datasource, TABLE_NAME name, TABLE_COMMENT remark, TABLE_COLLATION as table_collation FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = #{schemaName}
AND TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
